variationId.Wiki: Used to link BehaviorParam entries to a weapon or enemy.

refType.Wiki: Which param type to reference for attack behavior.

refId.Wiki: ID of param to use for attack behavior. Param used determined by refType

dummyPolyRange_Min.Wiki: ID of DummyPoly to use for bullet spawn positions. Value is the start of a range that ends with dummyPolyRange_Max. If max is -1, then a single dummypoly will be used.

dummyPolyRange_Max.Wiki: ID of DummyPoly to use for bullet spawn positions. Value is the end of a range that starts with dummyPolyRange_Min. If max is -1, then a single dummypoly will be used.
